programme.title: Michael Ang's Halal Kitchen - EP 1

Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan olehnya untuk memikat hati gadis tersebut dan dapatkah dia memihat hati gadis tersebut?

programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - VEETTODA MAPPILLAI
programme.desc: While Kandasamy's two sons-in-law are useless and unemployed, Manikkam, his third son-in-law, helps him improve his hotel business. But the return of Kandasamy's son causes trouble.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - VEETTODA MAPPILLAI
programme.desc: While Kandasamy's two sons-in-law are useless and unemployed, Manikkam, his third son-in-law, helps him improve his hotel business. But the return of Kandasamy's son causes trouble.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Sundari
programme.desc: Sundari is an ambitious girl whose ultimate goal is to become an IAS officer. Follow her inspiring journey filled with overwhelming odds and beautiful moments of joy as she strives to achieve her dream, while learning to embrace and love her appearance.

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Mr. Manaivi
programme.desc: Anjali and Vicky are two different individuals who approaches life differently, they both meet each other at a point where completely interesting lead begins.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 21
programme.desc: Knowing that the laser treatment is ineffective against the mutant patches, Zoe tries to stop Nicky, who just taken a bus for her treatment in town. Paquet is drafted in and doesn't know where to start when faced with a graffiti artist with bad taste and criminals on the run!

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Mamma En Chef - EP 9
programme.desc: Belarusians eat more potatoes than any other nation. So in Natalia's kitchen today the spotlight is firmly on the not so humble ''spud''! And at the end everyone is up and dancing, with vodka and gherkins thrown in!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Martin Roumagnac
programme.desc: In a small provincial town, Blanche Ferrand hopes to marry a rich consul, Mr de Laubry, whose wife is seriously ill. One evening, at a boxing match, she meets Martin Roumagnac, head of a building company, who falls madly in love with her. And so begins a passionate love affaire...

programme.title: Un Week-End
programme.desc: For 10 year-old Hector, the coming weekend is certain to be a very special one. He's about to meet his father, someone he hardly knows, and spend two days and two nights with him.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 5
programme.desc: Henri's parental responsibilities catch up with him when, in the middle of the night, he receives a worrying call from Alice, Marine is missing. Upset by a press report claiming that the murder investigation is going round in circles, Simone and Danno step up their efforts and refine their strategy.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 6
programme.desc: Simone and Danno interview a member of the consultative committee, someone Anne had worked with as part of her awareness campaign. For the first time, Anne is described as being a woman with problems. The revelation upsets Henri. Perhaps his marriage wasn't as perfect as he thought?

programme.title: Movie - Bogan
programme.desc: Vikram, a police officer, is investigating robberies in a jewelery shop and a bank, which seem like an inside job until he realises that the person involved is someone he knows.

programme.title: Movie - Inga Enna Solludhu
programme.desc: A man is forced into an unwanted marriage in order to become rich quickly with his wife's money. However, his foolishness and misfortune push his wife to attempt suicide.

programme.title: Movie - Sattathukku Oru Savaal
programme.desc: Sattathukku Oru Saval is directed by M. Karnan. with Suman and Madhavi in the lead roles.

programme.title: Movie - Sengaathu
programme.desc: Two closely-related families fall apart over a member of one family giving witness against a person belonging to the other in a murder trial. Their relationship deteriorates further from there.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Uyirodu Uyiraga
programme.desc: Ajay, a young man, is diagnosed with chronic brain tumour. He accepts his condition and lives a simple life, but Anjali, who loves his optimism, decides to lie to him in order to win his heart.

programme.title: Movie - Machakkaran
programme.desc: Vicky often gets into trouble due to bad luck. Things change when he meets and falls in love with Shivani, the daughter of a rich businessman.

programme.title: Movie - Enn Purushanthaan Enakkumattumthaan
programme.desc: Happily-married Vatsala looks after the family while her husband Marudhu works for her rich father. However, their peaceful life is interrupted when she suspects Marudhu of having an affair.

programme.title: Movie - Senkoattai
programme.desc: After foiling an assassination attempt on the PM, CBI officer Shekhar follows the lead on a foreigner, Franka. But this in turn leads him to a minister, Thirumurthy, who is the real mastermind.

programme.title: Movie - Manam Kothi Paravaigal
programme.desc: The son of a construction business owner falls in love with his neighbour's daughter. His life lands in danger when he learns that her father is a criminal.

programme.title: Movie - Varna Jalam
programme.desc: Daniel, a young man, wins over the heart of retired IPS officer Devanathan and his family. Soon, Daniel puts his plan into action which threatens to destroy their family.

programme.title: Movie - Senthooram
programme.desc: Muthu, a village chief, adopts Rosa, an orphan, and takes care of her. When Rosa gets married to Kattalai, Muthu tries to cause problems for the couple.

programme.title: Movie - Sevarkodi
programme.desc: Kali agrees to get his sister Valli married to the rich but old Annachi for his money. However, Valli elopes with Bala, her lover. Infuriated, Kali swears revenge.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Pudhu Nilavu
programme.desc: Madan breaks his friendship with Anand because the latter likes the same girl as he does. However, Madan is extremely shocked when he makes a discovery about Anand.

programme.title: Movie - Paarvai Ondre Pothume
programme.desc: Manoj becomes a successful hotelier through his hard work and helps his best friend, Vinod, by giving him a job. Their friendship is put to the test when both of them fall in love with Neetha.

programme.title: Movie - Avasara Police 100
programme.desc: A hardened criminal seeks revenge against his father for abandoning his mother. Soon, he finds a policeman who is a doppelganger of himself and decides to manipulate him for his own motive.

programme.title: Movie - Per Sollum Pillai
programme.desc: Rajalakshmi raises Ramu, an orphan, as her own son who in turn always protects his foster family. However, he must stop his malicious foster brothers from marrying off their real sister to a gangster.

programme.title: Movie - Muthukku Muthaga
programme.desc: A couple raises their five kids despite their insufficient income. They love their kids, and the love is well reciprocated. They guide their children through the path of their lives, but things change when they get older.

programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernán Crespo. programme.title: Fulham vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW12) - EP 116
programme.desc: Wolves haven’t won successive Premier League matches since February last season, while on the road they’re winless in their last 11 league matches (D4 L7), conceding 28 goals in that time.

programme.title: Everton vs Brentford (MW12) - EP 115
programme.desc: Brentford have lost all five of their Premier League away games this season; only in 1924-25 (9) and 1961-62 (9) have they ever lost each of their opening six or more away matches of a league campaign.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Crystal Palace (MW12) - EP 114
programme.desc: Aston Villa have lost just one of their 12 Premier League home games against Crystal Palace (W7 D4), never conceding more than once in any of these 12 meetings (6 goals conceded in total).

programme.title: Southampton vs Liverpool (MW12) - EP 118
programme.desc: Southampton have won just one of their last 14 Premier League games against Liverpool (D3 L10), a 1-0 home victory in January 2021.

programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Manchester United (MW12) - EP 119
programme.desc: This will be Rúben Amorim’s first match in charge of Manchester United. Aged 39 years and 302 days on the day of this game, he’s the youngest to take charge of his first match for the Red Devils since Wilf McGuinness in August 1969 (31y 288d).

programme.title: Leicester City vs Chelsea (MW12) - EP 111
programme.desc: After a six-game unbeaten run against Chelsea in the Premier League between 2018 and 2021 (W2 D4), Leicester have now lost four of their last five against the Blues (D1).

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW12) - EP 112
programme.desc: Bournemouth have won each of their last three Premier League home games and could win four matches in a row on home turf in the top-flight for the very first time.

programme.title: Manchester City vs Tottenham Hotspur (MW12) - EP 117
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just three of their last 10 Premier League games against Tottenham (D2 L5) and are looking to win consecutive meetings with them for the first time since April 2019.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Takarafuji, Yoshikaze, Takakeisho and Daishomaru from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: 100 finalists from across the country congregate on the Las Vegas strip for the American Ninja Warrior finals. This course consists of four stages to test the contestants' strength, speed and agility. In front of the finish line stands the massive metal monster, Mount Midoriyama with its daunting 77-foot Rope Climb. Can any of the contestants complete the challenges presented by The World's Most Difficult Obstacle Course? Part 5 of 5

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Yesenia Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, World Boxing Council (WBC) No. 1 contender Kim Clavel (15-0, 3 KOs) faces WBC Flyweight World Champion Yesenia Gomez (19-5-3, 6 KOs), who will defend her world title belt for the fifth time, at the Cabaret of Montreal Casino in Canada.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 8: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and the Martial Art of Grappling with Masters Renato Barreto and Breno Sivak.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Mike Tyson vs. Sammy Scaff
programme.desc: The talk of the boxing world takes center stage as a young Mike Tyson displays the lethal combination of speed and power that would later make him a World Champion. Tyson enters the Felt Forum in New York City with a 13-0 record, having knocked out every opponent he's faced thus far, with 9 of those knockouts coming in the first round.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Ulrik Bokeme vs Hicham El Gaoui
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Sallanches, France, features main event Hicham El Gaoui of Morrocco as he looks to ruin the Congo's Ulrik Bokeme's perfect record.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Kakuryu, Tochinoshin, Shodai and Hakuho from the Natsu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: FS MMA Ricardo Prasel vs. Daniel Omielanczuk
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight KSW 70 with a heavyweight main event featuring former Chelsea goalkeeper Ricardo Prasel of Brazil taking on UFC veteran Daniel Omielanczuk. In the co-feature, more heavyweights square off as Marek Samociuk takes on Izuagbe Ugonoh, as well as a bout between female strawweights Anita Bekus and Roberta Zocco. It's a stacked card from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Jermain Taylor vs. Kelly Pavlik
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Jermain 'Bad Intentions' Taylor (27-0, 17 KOs) making the 5th defense of his WBC and WBO Middleweight Titles, this time against upstart Kelly 'The Ghost' Pavlik (31-0, 28 KOs) on September 29, 2007 at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jonathon Banks vs. Seth Mitchell
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a heavyweight battle that ends in a curious decision between Jonathon Banks and Seth Mitchell , as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Sergio Mora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing off with Sergio Mora with a highly disputed and controversial decision you will have to see to believe! The two never had a rematch. Also on the card, action from WBC Super Welterweight champ Jermell Charlo.

programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.desc: GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.desc: The Go Jetters get a sinking feeling when Glitch turns the canals of Venice into roads.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 74
programme.desc: It's a windy day and the Teletubbies collect lots of leaves that have blown off the trees. The leaves go everywhere in Home Dome, so The Noo-­‐noo cleans up.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 7

programme.desc: The friends want Hooper to be the sheriff of Pop Paper City and make him a hobby horse.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: When Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof, the team rescue it in a down-to-earth way.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy wants to know how his goldfish friend can stay underwater for so long. He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.desc: When Jimmy Jones falls asleep doing some cloud-gazing, Monty wonders what animals dream about.

programme.desc: Gordon becomes very worried when he gets a serious case of the giggles. He must find a way to control his laughter before it does any damage.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Bluey's playgroup is at odds when Indy's baby hospital collides with Rusty's knights and dragons. But in explaining themselves, they both find that their games actually have a lot in common.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: When Indy and Rusty play Mums and Dads, they can't agree on who should go to work, so they part company. Indy has a hard time finding a babysitter, while Bluey makes Rusty her baby.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: It's time for a family game of hide and seek. Everyone hides, while Bluey counts to twenty, but will she be able to stay focused on the game and not get distracted by all her toys.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Supertato shows the Grape Kids how to camp Supertato-style, but Evil Pea arrives and wows them with her ice camping. Before long, the Grape Kids need to be rescued by Supertato.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 42
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 43
programme.desc: The Squirrels accidentally break the Chickens' TV aerial!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 44
programme.desc: It is a rainy day in the clubhouse which means it's a perfect day for a board game.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 20
programme.desc: Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 21
programme.desc: Xuli and Glitch need rescuing from a sinkhole.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 22
programme.desc: Greener fuel spells trouble for Glitch.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: Marian works hard on his traditional gyuveche, layering peppers, tomatoes and feta in beautiful Bulgarian pots and putting an egg on top of each one before it cooks in the oven.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: Jetting off in his Safari mobile, Andy heads to Indonesia in search of the world's largest lizard, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 26
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Gem's Jewels, her top Swashbuckle moments, which are dotted along a pirate treasure map.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: The toys are having a racing game.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Bluey is running a taxi service. Her first passenger is Businessman Dad, who is in a rush to get to the airport. But with unexpected delays, Dad's in danger of missing his flight!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: As Mum goes for a walk along the beach, Bluey runs to catch up with her. Along the way, she has a series of encounters that both excite and test her in her first solo adventure.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 81
programme.desc: Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-­‐noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S6) - EP 20
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'skin', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Dee and our friends show us Grandma's skin, banana skin and some noisy raspberry skin!

programme.desc: The friends go on a mountain hiking competition.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Messy and friends explore the forest with Tweedy. When her eyesight fails, Zim, Zam and Zoom lend a hand.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.desc: A teen gets nabbed for being in the wrong place at the wrong time, while a man who left town with a warrant gets caught when he returns for his aunt's funeral and faces a one million dollar bail.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In - EP 8
programme.desc: Bad decisions cause people to get booked in, including a first-timer that resisted arrest for riding their bicycle on the wrong side of the road, a couple that had half a pound of meth.

programme.title: American Justice - EP 17
programme.desc: When two separate cases run cold for women who have been abducted and murdered, it takes the courage of a third unsuspecting victim to unveil a killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: After a mother is viciously murdered by her foster daughter, interrogators ask the victim's husband if he was in on the plot.

programme.title: City Confidential - EP 10
programme.desc: When a city official is gunned down in Berryville, shocked residents are left wondering who among them is a cold-blooded killer.

programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer they've been hunting.

programme.title: Women On Death Row - EP 3
programme.desc: In 2009, Emilia Carr and her boyfriend Joshua Fulgham were convicted for the first-degree murder and kidnapping of Heather Strong, and Emilia alone was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Facing the death penalty, Jodi Arias takes the stand for an unprecedented 18-days in an attempt to explain how the brutal killing of her ex-boyfriend was self-defense.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6) - EP 17
programme.desc: In the dead of winter, a 14-year-old girl vanishes without a trace on her way to school and her parents have no idea where she could be. Will the missing teenager be found before it’s too late?

programme.title: Booked: First Day In - EP 7

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: A married Navy police officer faces tough questions after the woman he was having an affair with goes missing and a wife accused of murdering her husband is finally interrogated after ten years on the run.

programme.title: First Blood (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Known for the murders of University of Florida students, Danny Rolling's first killings were in his hometown of Shreveport, Louisiana. He longed for a loving family, but he destroyed one instead.

programme.title: Fatal Vows (S6) - EP 6
programme.desc: Francis 'Nicky' Nicolosi and his devout wife Ellie are living out the perfect retirement. But when one is found dead in an apple orchard, police discover there’s more to this frail and religious couple.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S7) - EP 9
programme.desc: Rose grapples with devastating news while Trinity encourages the women to find positive ways to express themselves. Darius coaches the men on how to make money. The return of another inmate causes turmoil.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: After being pursued by handsome Kevin Lewis, Amanda can't wait to marry her new man. But on their honeymoon, Amanda discovers a different side to Kevin - he likes things done a certain way.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: A mother of four is accused of killing her 11-week-old baby and is now facing life in prison. The prosecution alleges the infant was violently shaken-but the defence insists this isn't what happened.

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House - EP 6
programme.desc: When noises fill Courtney Randolph's home, her two exes offer help, but she's blind to what's happening around her. Davis Wahlman says he saw a woman jog out of his house, and he gets another surprise.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6) - EP 3
programme.desc: Lakhvir Singh enjoyed cooking for Lucky Cheema, the man she loved. But when he left her to marry a much younger woman, Singh made the couple a meal that would turn out to be the last Lucky ever tasted.

programme.title: Asia (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of Asia's frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Britain (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Joanna travels through Scotland, the Outer Hebrides and Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) - EP 5

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Sustainable Future
programme.desc: Sustainable Future is CNBC's umbrella franchise to house explorations and discussions on the most important issue of our time; sustainability. In 30 minute episodes the world’s most knowledgeable, passionate and powerful people explore what needs to be done to make sure we all have a Sustainable Future.

programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC’s flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europe’s equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Connect the World
programme.desc: Becky Anderson explores diverse perspectives and explains global issues of the day.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The World From Above S2
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Hopeful Earth
programme.desc: This series travels around the world to meet the people who create the energies of tomorrow through unusual ideas. An extraordinary journey in 8 different countries to unearth imaginative solutions to the present energy and environmental issues.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Earth On Edge
programme.desc: Documentary series about the climate crisis. We travel to Iceland, Greenland, Denmark, Japan and California to explore the effects of a warming planet. While the situation is dire, there is hope. Brilliant minds are coming up with solutions that could show us a new way. As we stand on the edge, what is our next step?

programme.title: Tabula Rasa S3
programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: The Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Shot on location with stunning cinematography, The Wild Bunch offers an intimate insight into Africa's most threatened species. Travelling across South Africa, through wild bush, high grassland and arid mountaintops, each episode is freestanding; focusing on the challenges or conflicts of a particular animal.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Finding Dish
programme.desc: Program contains light information about the world of health and food combining

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Podsea
programme.desc: A podcast program where we talk to someone famous in the past. We do little throwbacks about a certain period of time, talk about music, movies, or trends that were happening in the past, to reminisce about some memorable old stories.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Lady Killers
programme.desc: British crime writer, Martina Cole, examines the life and times of the most notorious female serial killers across history and asks: why do women kill and why are we surprised when they do?

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say

programme.title: Japan Genesis: Pilgrimage to the Land of the Gods 5min.
Grand Sumo Tournament Kyushu Basho Highlights
Historical Drama "Dear Radiance" Eps. 45 (R)
programme.desc: Mahiro’s writing of the Tale of Genji is finally coming to an end. One day, when Katako asks Mahiro about her desire to serve the court, Mahiro suggests that she serves Akiko, who has become Grand Empress Dowager, instead of her. Mahiro, on the other hand, decides to go on a journey that she has long dreamed of. However, against the opposition of Michinaga, Mahiro finally reveals the secret concerning Katako. Meanwhile, Michinaga decides to become a monk.

programme.title: Correlation Diagram of the Complex Social Phenomena

programme.desc: Shirakawa-go is one of Japan's snowiest regions, famous for its traditional thatched-roof Gassho-style homes. Every detail of life here is reflected in the cooperative bond shared by residents.

programme.title: Okinawa: The Holiest Place
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 24, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The stories behind hit Japanese products, plus top creations for niche markets. This time: fan-cooled workwear and marine cargo tanks.

programme.title: Bosai: Landslides
programme.desc: Each year in mountainous Japan, about 1,000 landslides including land slips, debris flows, and falling rocks occur, often causing major damage. We'll look at their causes and latest countermeasures.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: At a temple once believed to have been home to a dragon, we meet 20 playful cats. They show off their favorite spots and play together. Next, we visit Tokoname and meet a real-life beckoning cat!

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 68
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 11
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 9
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 17

After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 10
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 17
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 18
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 68
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 11
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 9
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 18
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1631
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Bounty Lady - EP 16
programme.desc: Leading Public Affairs Expert HEUNG KWONG-NAM (Dayo Wong), a renowned savior of the bachelorettes in town, often helps his single female clients have a happy marriage by using unexpected methods, yet he himself remains single and is satisfied with short-term relationships.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter - EP 21
programme.desc: Rewind twenty years and an operation causes pediatric trainees Fong Chung-yan (Kenneth Ma) and Hui Kam-fung (Kevin Cheng) to become foes. Fast-forward to the present and Chung-yan is a consultant pediatric surgeon at a top hospital. He and Kam-fung, who is employed by a second-tier hospital, meet up again due to a liver transplant operation. Chung-yan coaxes Kam-fung into joining his elite team.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 12
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 20
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Ruse of Engagement - EP 21
programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng). The brothers join the Intelligence Unit and the Operations Unit of Anti-Terrorist Force respectively, and both gain recognition from their superior SHUM CHI-NGO (Eddie Kwan), which is supposed to be a comfort to their mother. Unexpectedly, their brotherhood is turned to enmity owing to an intelligence.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony II - EP 95
programme.desc: In the early 1980s’, everyone knows about GUCCI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY). She was the most beautiful woman in the police force and many men were after her. After getting married, GUCCI took good care of her family, especially after her husband died. She brought up her step-sons, NIN (LAM MAN LUNG, FRANKIE) and YUE (TSE TIN WAH, MICHAEL), and step-daughter, YAT (CHAN YIN HANG, JOYCE). She also manages the restaurant, ‘Honey Cave’, which her husband has left her.

programme.desc: Widow TONG SUK-FAN (Louise Lee) is saddled with hardship alone, struggling to bring up her two sons CHONG YAU-CHING (Ruco Chan) and CHONG YAU-KIT (Ron Ng).
